[[File:TradeStone.png|thumb|200px|The Trade Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Trade Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Fuschia City]] in [[Kanto]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler || [[File:Golem.png|40px]] Golem |- | [[File:Kadabra.png|40px]] Kadabra || [[File:Alakazam.png|40px]] Alakazam |- | [[File:Machoke.png|40px]] Machoke || [[File:Machamp.png|40px]] Machamp |- | [[File:Haunter.png|40px]] Haunter || [[File:Gengar.png|40px]] Gengar |- | [[File:Karrablast.png|40px]] Karrablast || [[File:Escavalier.png|40px]] Escavalier |- | [[File:Shelmet.png|40px]] Shelmet || [[File:Accelgor.png|40px]] Accelgor |- | [[File:Gurdurr.png|40px]] Gurdurr || [[File:Conkeldurr.png|40px]] Conkeldurr |}
